name: Map Generation
explanations: Drag&drop to move around the map
Click on a room to highlight it

name: Capture
explanations: Move your mouse while holding down left click to draw on screen
Make a circle around a shape without touching it to make it disappear

name: Turn-based RPG
explanations: Click on a tile within your range to move there
Turn the mouth around to see your line of sight

name: Fishing
explanations: Move your cursor to move your hook until a fish is foccused on it
When a fish is bitting, move your mouse to keep it on your target until you capture it

name: Achievements
explanations: Play the others games to unlock these!
